name: The Moated Chateau of Sologne
description:
DESCRIPTION
For an exceptional and authentic setting, the Chateau is the perfect location for your wedding celebration. It is in this castle inhabited for more than 350 years and in a family and friendly spirit that you will have the opportunity to give rise to the celebration of your wedding. Everything will be done to guarantee the celebration of your love while respecting your expectations.
There are several beautiful reception rooms to choose from to suit the size and style of your day. These are available all year round and will allow you to organise an event which is tailor-made to your needs in an unforgettable Chateau.
Located 20 minutes from Orléans by car but also accessible by train from Orléans or Bourges train stations, the Château has large car parks and plenty of amenities to make your day go without a hitch. For your prestigious reception, the château offers you the space of the Orangerie. The latter was damaged by fire in 1944 and renovated since 1989. This space has a majestic room of 232 m², with French ceilings, stone slabs and Italian terracotta which give the place a sophisticated atmosphere and incomparable prestige for your unforgettable day.
At the back of this room, the pavilion on the left gives a glimpse of a succession of small 18th century salons. The very intimate atmosphere of its wooded rooms with fireplace allows guests to form small, more intimate groups during large receptions.
For your more intimate weddings (max 42 people for a seated dinner) the gite can welcome you. This house located in the park of the castle is privatized for your whole weekend.
The Orangery of the Château:
232 m2
In the heart of the main courtyard of the Château is a reception room worthy of the greatest châteaux of the Loire. The stunning Orangerie is perfect for your wedding breakfast or cocktail reception.
The room includes a mezzanine of 30 m2, a catering kitchen, two small 18th century lounges, toilets and a cloakroom.
The Ermitage Winter Garden
70 m2
Located on an island in the park of the castle, with a living and dining room of 70 m2 and includes a traditional fireplace in a brick house typical of Sologne.
The interior rooms of the castle:
It is also possible to privatize some of the historic rooms in the castle itself:
The historic vaulted kitchens (150 m2)
The guard room (100 m2)
The dining room for prestigious and intimate dining (for a maximum of 20 people)
Gîtes:
For your guests, our gites can accommodate a maximum of 42 people, ideal for bringing friends and family together to continue the celebrations!
The accommodation includes the following:
The Ermitage
1 double / 7 single / 3 bunk
Large brick house on a private 2 hectare island in the historic park 400 meters from the castle. Large living room, living room, dining room, family kitchen, 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. Ideal for disconnecting in the middle of a natural setting.
The Deer Pavilion
12 doubles / 5 singles
Located in the main courtyard of the Château, a large 17th century pavilion on 2 floors. 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a living room and a large family kitchen.
The Pavilion of the Orangerie
3 doubles / 4 singles / 2 bunk
Set of 4 rooms in a 17th century pavilion classified as a Historic Monument, located in the main courtyard facing the castle. It can accommodate up to 12 people. The cottage does not have a kitchen or a living room. It can be rented in addition to the lodge at the deer pavilion or at the Ermitage.
Packages:
The Orangerie with 2 outbuildings for 27 guests at the rate of 4815€ for a night
The Orangerie with 2 outbuildings for 27 guests at the rate of 5350€ for two nights
The Ermitage in addition for two nights minimum at the rate of 1082.84€
On request, the Château can put you in touch with service providers for the choice of a caterer or a sound system.
If you have any further questions about this venue then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
Photo Credit: Un Mariage Dereve / Les Ateliers du Lux
